questions.questionEn: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.questionHi: लाल ग्रह के रूप में किस ग्रह को जाना जाता है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Mars is known as the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

questions.questionEn: What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
questions.questionHi: सोने का रासायनिक प्रतीक क्या है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: The chemical symbol for Gold is Au (from Latin 'aurum').
